mapper.select: select B.* from(select rownum rn, A.* from (select * from genBoard order by write_no desc)A)B where rn between #{s} and #{e}
mapper.insert: insert into genBoard (write_no, category, n_id, title, content, imageName1, imageName2, imageName3, imageName4, imageName5) values (genBoard_seq.NEXTVAL, #{category}, #{id}, #{title}, #{content}, #{imageName1}, #{imageName2}, #{imageName3}, #{imageName4}, #{imageName5})
